casebody.data:
No. — , original.

Texas v. New Mexico. November 11, 1935. Mr. William McCraw, Attorney General of Texas, Mr. H. Grady Chandler, Assistant Attorney General, and Messrs. Richard F. Burges and Edwin Mechem for plaintiff, in support of the motion.

The motion for leave to file the Bill of Complaint herein is granted and process is ordered to issue returnable on Monday, January 13, 1936.
